thread.section_title: Better Life Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Better Life | www.cleanhappens.com
thread.title: Ann F.
thread.title_full: Better Life reviewed by Ann F.

author: Ann F.
title: Ann F.
text: All purpose spray was recommended by a friend, and now I buy so many products from this wonderful company. It's very important to me to keep away from as many chemicals as I can, but I still want products that work, and this is where I find them. I will continue to be a loyal customer. What could be better than a small company and fantastic products?
